scripts.mc: cd server; screen -dmS mc java -Xmx8192M -jar server.jar --nogui; echo start mc server OK.
scripts.ffmpeg: ffmpeg -vaapi_device /dev/dri/renderD128 -f x11grab -framerate 30 -draw_mouse 0 -i :10.0+0,0 -thread_queue_size 2048 -f pulse -i default -vf 'hwupload,scale_vaapi=format=nv12,setpts=N/(30*TB)' -c:v h264_vaapi -global_quality 1 -bf 0 -c:a aac -b:a 128k -vsync 1 -f flv rtmp://127.0.0.1/main
scripts.ready: sudo chmod 666 /dev/dri/renderD128; sudo systemctl restart xrdp
